_comment: VM network configuration for H4NDv2 Hyper-V infrastructure (INFRA-VM-001)
_usage: All scripts in scripts/vm/ read from this file. Override per-environment by copying and editing.

Switch.Name: H4ND-Switch
Switch._note: Internal vSwitch for host<->VM only. Not Default Switch.

Host._note: Static IP assigned to vEthernet (H4ND-Switch) adapter on host

VM._note: Set inside VM guest OS via Provision-H4NDv2.ps1 or manually

NAT.Name: H4ND-NAT
NAT._note: NAT for VM internet access via host. Created by Setup-CDPNetwork.ps1.

CDP._note: Chrome DevTools Protocol port. Must match CdpConfig.Port in appsettings.json.

Firewall._note: Allows TCP {CDP.Port} from {Subnet} only. Created by Setup-CDPNetwork.ps1.
